name: Light Borrower (itch)
description:
Light Borrower Store Page 

If you would like to give feedback or play more levels (while furiously clicking past feedback menus), check out our playtest build.

Light Borrower uses an audio plugin incompatible with webgl -- the web demo contains an approximation of the true audio.

Join Rebekah as she faces the Cleansing, a coming-of-age ritual that will determine  whether she joins the last survivors of the end of the world or is banished above ground.

Solve light and shadow puzzles, rotating and sliding contraptions piece by piece to find the hidden goal. Read decrees and rebellious newsletters left behind when the survivors retreated deeper underground. Uncover the Truth, and then dig deeper.

Light Borrower is intended for a mid-2018 release.
